i5.las2peer.classLoaders

Class L2pClassManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.classLoaders.L2pClassManager

  • public class L2pClassManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for loading classes in the las2peer environment. This ClassLoader handles library registering and resolving (i.e. loading) dependencies as well as hotplugging. The main idea is to keep each service separate but load each needed library only once.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      create a new L2PClassLoader, which uses the given repositories
      L2pClassManager(Repository repository, java.lang.ClassLoader platformLoader)
      create a new L2pClassLoader, which uses the given repository
